question: How many pseudo users were active in the last 7 days but inactive in the last 2 days as of January 7, 2021?

steps.goal: Identify active pseudo users in the last 7 days up to January 7, 2021.
steps.intermediate_output: List of unique pseudo users active from January 1 to January 7, 2021.

steps.goal: Identify active pseudo users in the last 2 days (January 6 and 7, 2021).
steps.intermediate_output: List of unique pseudo users active on January 6 and 7, 2021.

steps.goal: Determine pseudo users active in the last 7 days but inactive in the last 2 days.
steps.intermediate_output: Set of pseudo users active in the last 7 days minus those active in the last 2 days.

steps.goal: Count the number of pseudo users who meet the criteria.
steps.intermediate_output: Count of pseudo users active in the last 7 days but inactive in the last 2 days.

final_answer_derivation: Final count of pseudo users who were active in the last 7 days and inactive in the last 2 days.
